publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2287 Michael Russell: Consuls and Consuls General in Scotlandâ€”That the Parliament notes the effective contribution made to Scottish public life by the Consuls and Consuls General in Scotland; encourages all nations to appoint such representatives pending the opportunities that will exist after independence to welcome Ambassadors and their staffs to Scotland, and, in particular, expresses its thanks to Dan Mulhall, Consul General of Ireland and Kare Hauge, Consul General of Norway, for their work over the crucial period of the establishment of the Parliament and wishes them well as they leave their Edinburgh postings.
S1M-2287 Consuls and Consuls General in Scotland (lodged on 3 October 2001) Kay Ullrich*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2287 Consuls and Consuls General in Scotland (lodged on 3 October 2001) Michael Matheson*, Robin Harper*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2287 Consuls and Consuls General in Scotland (lodged on 3 October 2001) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2287 Consuls and Consuls General in Scotland (lodged on 3 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-2287 Consuls and Consuls General in Scotland (lodged on 3 October 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-2287 Consuls and Consuls General in Scotland (lodged on 3 October 2001) Irene McGugan*, Fiona McLeod*
